q: Packers ahead 7-0 on their way to a 21-14 victory. ''He's like a very good scorer in basketball- you know he's going to get points,'' Steelers defensive coordinator Dick LeBeau said. From a defensive standpoint, you've got to keep him from controlling the game and monopolizing the game. That's what we have to try and do with Aaron Rodgers . He's a great player. He can create, improvise with his feet, go to his second and third choice in the route because he has such a quick release. The 6-foot-5, 241-pound Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers or Michael Vick nor as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN) said he was nearing a decision on his political future, the Indianapolis Star reports. A run for Indiana governor is also a possibility. Said Mike Pence : We've been trying to listen first to Hoosiers and then to other voices around the country about where they think we might best serve in the years ahead.
